item.description: `The` **`User Authentication and Profiles`** `module allows users/Admins to register and log in securely using JWT. Users can create and update their profiles, set favorite genres and actors, and manage a Wishlist of movies they want to watch.`

item.name: Movie Database Management

response.name: Admin(MovieDeletion)

item.description: `The` **`Movie Database Management`** `module lets admins easily add, update, or delete movies in the database. Each movie includes details like title, genre, director, cast, release date, runtime, synopsis, and average rating. Movies also have sections for fun Trivia, Goofs (errors), and Soundtrack Information. Users can view detailed profiles of actors, directors, and crew members, including their filmography and awards. Age ratings and parental guidance are provided for each movie to help users know if content is suitable for kids.`

item.name: Rating and Review Module

response.name: Add Or Update Review
CheckReview(With MovieID)

item.description: `The` **`Rating and Review Module`** `allows users to share their opinions about movies. Users can rate movies on a scale of 1 to 5 and write or update their own reviews. They can also read ratings and reviews from other users. The module features Review Highlights, showcasing top-rated and most-discussed reviews to help users discover popular opinions and recommendations.`

item.description: `The` **`Recommendation System`** `suggests movies based on user ratings, favorite genres, and similar user activity. It shows related movies on each movie page and provides personalized suggestions on the homepage. Users can also see trending and top-rated movies.`

item.description: `The Watchlist and Custom Lists module allows users to create and curate personalized lists, such as "Best Horror Movies" or "Top Sci-Fi Films," and share them with others. Users can also follow or save lists created by others, enabling them to discover new content based on shared interests. This feature enhances the social aspect of the platform, making it easier to explore and enjoy curated recommendations.   `

item.description: `The Search, Filter, and Advanced Filtering module allows users to efficiently search for movies based on various criteria like title, genre, director, or actors. It includes options to filter results by ratings, popularity, and release year, along with advanced filters such as release decade, country of origin, and keywords. Additionally, it offers curated lists like "Top Movies of the Month" and "Top 10 by Genre" for easy access to trending films.   `

item.description: `The "Upcoming Releases and Notifications" module allows users to view upcoming movie releases with their release dates. Users can set reminders for new movies or trailers based on their preferences. Additionally, notifications are sent via email or the dashboard to keep users informed about new content in their favorite genres.   `
